title: The ratio of present ages of two person is 3:2 and 10 years back, the ratio was 2:1. What will be the ratio of their ages after 5 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let the rational between their ages be x The ratio of present ages of two person is 3/: 2 Thus the ages of two persons are 3x and 2x respectively. 10 years back, the ratio was 2 : 1. Ten years back their ages were (3x - 10) and (2x - 10) and the ratio was 2 : 1 (3x - 10) / (2x - 10) = 2 / 1 Cross multiplication 2 (2x - 10) = (3x - 10) 4x - 20 = 3x - 10 4x - 3x = 20 - 10 x = 10 The rational is 10 Thus their present ages, 3x = 3 × 10 = 30 years and 2x = 2 × 10 = 20 years. Ratio of their ages after 5 years Their ages after 5 years will be 30 + 5 = 35 years and 20 + 5 = 25 years The ratio between the ages of two persons after 5 years will be 35 : 25 or 7 : 5 Answer: The ratio between the ages of two persons after 5 years will be 7 : 5

Let their present ages be x and y A.T.Q. x/y =3/2 2x=3y x= 3y/2 ……(1.) 10 years back their age ratio was 2:1 (x-10)/(y-10)=2/1 x-10=2y-20 From (1.),put the value of x We get, y=20 And x = 30 After 5 years their age will be 35 and 25 Which means their age ratio after 5 years will be 35/25 =7:5

Here’s a shortcut that i normally use. 10 years ago the ratio was 2:1. Now it is 3:2. So judging by the numbers in the ratio, we can see that only 1 is added in numerator as well as denominator. As 1 is added after 10 years, this added 1 would be transformed to 10, thus 2:1 will become 20:10 and 3:2 will become 30:20. These numbers do satisfy the conditions given in the question. Thus after 5 years, the ratio will be 35:25 i.e. 7:5.

We have given ratio of present age =3:2 Hence,let present age is 3x and 2x. Now,10 years back, Ratio of ages is= 3x-10/2x-10which is equal to 2/1(given) 3x-10=2(2x-10) 3x-10=4x-20 X=10 therefore present age is 30 and 20. Now ratio of ages after 5 years =30+5/20+5=35/25=7/5. Hence,ratio of ages after 5 years=7:5.

Let us say A is 3x and B is 2x years, now. (3x-10):(2x-10) = 2:1, or 4x-20 = 3x-10, or x = 10 In 5 years’ time A will be 35 years and B will be 25. The ratio of their ages 5 years from now will be 7:5.
